head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DUGDALE, JOHN FREDERICK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DUGDALE, JOHN FREDERICK

block.p: DUGDALE-John Frederick, of New York City, after a short illness on May 10, 2000 at age 86. writer, historian, artist, British army Military Cross recipient, and British car industry expert, originally of Weybridge, England. Beloved husband of Carmen, father of Shirley and Juanita, stepfather of Tracey and Carleton. Memorial service to be held in New York on Thursday, June 15th at St. James' Church, 865 Madison Ave, (71st St.) at 4:00 PM.
